name: Space Ric-O-Shay
overview: SPACE RIC-O-SH A Y" is a fast action space game played with one or two players. It's high resolution graphics and fast action make this number one in space games. OBJECT OF THE GAME You ore approaching your galactic outpost on Sigmo-Beto 7 when you spot on Alderon Mother Ship in orbit just above the *L2' settlement. Since Alderons are wanted tor planet piracy, you arm yourself and attack. But as the Mother Ship explodes, four Pods escape. These Pods contain an explosive that can destroy you on contact. So therefore your mission is not only to shoot down the Mother Ship but to destroy the explosive Pods before they descend and get you. Points are accumulated by destroying the Mother Ship and the Pods. The highest score after using 5 ships WINS.
